Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
CBRE, Inc. is offering an excellent and unique opportunity to purchase approximately 11,410 sq. ft. office and medical building on 1.01 Acres of land with immediate 
I-10 freeway access in Loma Linda, California, part of San Bernardino County.  The property is situated with street frontage on Business Center Drive close to the Mountain View Avenue exit close to Redlands Boulevard with easy access to the I-10 and I-210 freeways, just 20 miles from Ontario International Airport and 60 miles east of Los Angeles.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
CBRE, Inc. is offering an excellent and unique ‘value add’ opportunity to purchase an approximately 18,859 sq. ft. office/flex building on 1.06 acres of land with immediate 1-10 freeway access in Loma Linda, California. Great opportunity for an owner/occupier to take advantage of the existing income from one tenant on 1/2 of the building (credit tenant) while occupying the other half effectively reducing the cost of occupancy. The tenant is new and their space completely remodeled. 
The property is situated with street frontage on Business Center Drive and Commerce Street with easy access to the Mountain View Avenue, 1-10 on/off ramps, just 20 miles from Ontario International Airport and 60 miles east of Los Angeles.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: 18,859 SF Building for Sale and Lease in Redlands, CA
